title: Pagetype timer content
description: Description of the content of the Pagetype 'timer'

mainTimer.description: A timed showing of information. This defines how much time there is.

time.description: The Amount of seconds the Timer will run. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

show.description: Set to true if you want the countdown to be shown as 12, 11, 10,... False if you want to hide it. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

mainText.description: The text shown on the Page while the timer is running. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

mainImg.description: Filename of the image thats shown while the timer is running. Has to have the file ending included. Possible endings are 'mp4', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif'. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

preTimer.description: If you want to have some time on the page before the timer starts use this. It defines how many seconds till the real timer starts.

time.description: The Amount of seconds the Timer will run. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

show.description: Set to true if you want the pre countdown to be shown as -2, -1, 0,... False if you want to hide it. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

preText.description: The text shown on the Page before the timer starts = while the preTimer runs. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

preImg.description: Filename of the image thats shown before the timer starts = while the preTimer runs. Has to have the file ending included. Possible endings are 'mp4', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif'. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

postTimer.description: A timer thats started after the main timer ended. When this one ends the next page will be loaded

time.description: The Amount of seconds the Timer will run. -1 for instant load of next page. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

show.description: Set to true if you want the post countdown to be shown as 5, 4, 3... False if you want to hide it. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

postText.description: The text shown on the Page after the timer has expired. Include {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

postImt.description: Filename of the image thats shown after the timer has expired. Has to have the file ending included. Possible endings are 'mp4', 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif'. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

startIndicatorSound.description: Path to the file of the sound that is played when the mainTimer starts. Has to have the file ending included. Possible endings are 'wav' and 'mp3'. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

endIndicatorSound.description: Path to the file of the sound that is played when the mainTimer ends. Has to have the file ending included. Possible endings are 'wav' and 'mp3'. OR write {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties

continueDelay.description: The amount of seconds after which the Continue Button is shown, after the end of the timer. -1 for never(wait for Hardware). OR {{obj.propertyname}} or {{subj.propertyname}} to access the current subject or objects properties. Can also be accessed by hardware, via the 'showContinueButton' event
